welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Storrs, where charm and history meet in the heart of Connecticut. Get ready to explore our beautiful city and enjoy its renowned attractions and local charm."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brainard Airport, offering services for both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for airlines such as Air Canada, Aer Lingus, and JetBlue.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westover ARB/Metropolitan Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Westover ARB/Metropolitan Airport is used exclusively by military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free, but it may be slower due to the airport's location in a rural area.
